summary: This is a Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG) memorandum documenting a voluntary interview with a Federal Bureau of Prisons Lieutenant regarding the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York in August 2019. The document references numerous attached logs, emails, and reports from the period surrounding Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate whose death at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York in 2019 is the subject of the OIG investigation. He was housed at MCC in July and August 2019.

persons.name: Lieutenant
persons.role: Operations Lieutenant, Federal Bureau of Prisons
persons.context: A BOP Operations Lieutenant at MCC New York when Epstein was housed there. Voluntarily interviewed by OIG agents on September 1, 2021, regarding the circumstances surrounding Epstein's death.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.role: Special Agent, DOJ Office of the Inspector General
persons.context: Conducted the voluntary interview of the BOP Lieutenant on September 1, 2021, as part of the OIG investigation into Epstein's death.

persons.name: Senior Special Agent
persons.role: Senior Special Agent, DOJ Office of the Inspector General
persons.context: Conducted the voluntary interview of the BOP Lieutenant on September 1, 2021, alongside another Special Agent.

persons.name: Leonardo Fernandez
persons.context: Mentioned as an inmate in an attached document (Inmate Quarters History Report).

persons.name: Captain
persons.context: Recipient of an email dated August 12, 2019, referenced in the attachments.

connections.description: The OIG Special Agent interviewed the BOP Lieutenant as part of the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The OIG Senior Special Agent co-conducted the interview of the BOP Lieutenant.
The Lieutenant was an Operations Lieutenant at MCC New York during the period Epstein was housed there prior to his death.

events.title: OIG Interview of BOP Lieutenant
events.description: Special Agent and Senior Special Agent from the DOJ Office of the Inspector General conducted a voluntary, recorded interview of a BOP Operations Lieutenant regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Death of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein, inmate register number 76318-054, died while housed at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. The OIG investigation is centered on this event.

events.title: Epstein's Incarceration at MCC New York
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was housed at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York during July and August 2019, prior to his death.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), New York, New York
keyFacts: The DOJ Office of the Inspector General (OIG) was investigating the death of Federal Bureau of Prisons inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
A BOP Operations Lieutenant who was on duty when Epstein was housed at MCC in July/August 2019 was interviewed by OIG agents on September 1, 2021.

The memorandum references a substantial number of attached documentary evidence, including lieutenant logs, activity reports, assignment rosters, emails, and inmate records from the days surrounding Epstein's death in August 2019.
Jeffrey Epstein's BOP register number was 76318-054.
The document states the interview was recorded and transcribed, and the recording was saved separately due to its large file size.
